name: MinorMiner
description:
MinorMiner is a procedurally generated roguelite mining game where you can explore unlimited randomized biomes, fight bosses, and upgrade your gear!

Made for Ludum Dare 48!

How To Play

Explore the world to find shops, defeat enemies, and fight bosses. Defeating a boss guides you to the nearest shop. Clicking an ore in your inventory removes it and clicking a tool in your inventory switches your tool out. Have fun!

Controls

M - Mute Music

WASD or Arrows - Move

SPACE - Jump

E - Interact with boss or shop

I - Open Inventory

ESC - Exit
